backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining clients, tasks, assignees, user profiles, and access‑controlled CRUD operations with per‑caller storage maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a fix for Radix Select crashes and listing affected files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, authentication flow, profile setup gating, deferred URL cleanup, and top‑level routing.
frontend/src/components/assignees/Assign: Dialog for bulk uploading assignees via CSV with parsing, validation, and mutation handling.
Modal form to create, edit, or delete an assignee with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Always-open modal prompting the user to enter and save their name on first setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignedOutSc: Public landing screen with branding and a login button for Internet Identity sign‑in.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientBu: Dialog for uploading a CSV, validating rows, previewing results, and bulk‑creating clients.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientFo: Modal for creating, editing, or deleting a client with field validation and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppStartu: Error boundary that catches startup errors and displays a fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/errors/StartupEr: Fallback UI shown on startup errors with a reload button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with navigation, mobile menu, user dropdown, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkEd: Dialog for bulk-editing multiple tasks, building update objects conditionally and submitting them via bulkUpdateTasks.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkUp: Dialog for uploading tasks from CSV, showing parsed results and validation errors, and submitting new tasks via bulkCreateTasks.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskDetail: Read-only panel displaying all task fields with formatted dates, currency, and labels.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskFormDi: Create/edit task dialog with full form state management, status coercion, and submit handling for create or update mutations.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskQuickS: Inline status selector that updates a task’s status using updateTask.
frontend/src/constants/taskStatus.ts: Defines allowed task statuses and utilities for normalizing, validating, coercing, and displaying them.
frontend/src/hooks/assignees.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD and bulk operations on assignees using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/clients.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD and bulk operations on clients through the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/tasks.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, creating, updating, deleting, and bulk operations on tasks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and updates the caller's user profile using the actor with React Query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeferredUrlCleanup: Reads secret URL parameters into session storage and removes them from the URL on mount.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and related state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark theme palettes.
frontend/src/lib/dataParser.ts: Deprecated helpers for parsing and encoding legacy client data structures.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AssigneesPage.tsx: Renders the assignees management page with search, selection, bulk delete, and edit dialog functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a single client, including task stats, related tasks, and edit/create dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Lists all clients with search, selection, bulk delete, and bulk upload, plus client creation/editing dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows task-based business metrics such as revenue, upcoming and overdue tasks, and status summaries.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Provides full task management with filtering, sorting, bulk actions, uploads, exports, and task create/edit dialogs.
frontend/src/utils/assigneeCsv.ts: Generates and parses CSV files for assignee bulk upload, including validation and backend formatting helpers.
frontend/src/utils/clientCsv.ts: Generates and parses client CSV uploads with validation and conversion to backend-ready structures.
frontend/src/utils/taskAggregations.ts: Computes aggregated task metrics including revenue by category, status counts, and overall task statistics.
frontend/src/utils/taskCsv.ts: CSV utilities for generating a task template and parsing/validating task data with extended fields.
frontend/src/utils/taskDisplay.ts: Helpers for rendering task fields, including date, currency, and optional text formatting with placeholders.
frontend/src/utils/taskExcel.ts: Converts tasks to SheetJS-friendly data and exports them to an Excel file, loading XLSX from CDN if needed.
frontend/src/utils/taskSort.ts: Sorting utilities for tasks across multiple fields with safe comparisons for null and formatted statuses.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme, colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing architecture, issues, and feature requirements for the task/client management app.
